General.Name: Tigbur - Temporary Professional Personnel Ltd
General.Description: Tigbur - Temporary Professional Personnel Ltd. provides placement and nursing services primarily in Israel. It offers manpower services in the field of technical, office, industrial, nursing services, construction, and hotels. The company also engages in the provision of guarding, security, cleaning, and management and operation of a geriatric hospital and other activities. In addition, it provides home care and foreign worker care services; and counseling services for elderly and its family members. The company was incorporated in 1981 and is based in Ramat Gan, Israel.
